response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only willing to make this deal with you. If you're interested, please let me know as soon as possible. If not, I'll be speaking with John, who is also interested in purchasing the product and is willing to pay the full market value of $1,000,000.", "product_price": 900000}
